General.Name: Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiary, provides hire-purchase and financial leasing services in Thailand. The company offers pickup, taxi, tractor, and truck loans. It also provides non-life and life insurance brokerage services. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Ratchthani Leasing Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of Thanachart SPV 1 Company Limited.
